mapper.select:
select A.productId, A.productName, A.productPrice, B.outputAmount, date_format(B.salesDate, '%Y-%m-%d') salesDate from product A left join outputlist B on A.productId = B.productId
where month(B.salesDate) = cast(#{month} as unsigned)
order by salesDate desc

select ifnull(sum(c.weektotal), 0) from (select b.productPrice * b.productAmount weektotal from (select * from outputlist where salesDate between (date_format(date_sub(now(), interval weekday(now()) day), '%Y-%m-%d' )) and (select date_format(date_sub(now(), interval weekday(now()) - 6 day), '%Y-%m-%d' ))) a left join product b on a.productId = b.productId) c

select a. productId, b.productName, b.productPrice, a.outputAmount, b.productPrice * a.outputAmount totalPrice, date_format(a.salesDate, '%Y-%m-%d') salesDate from (select * from outputlist where salesDate between (date_format(date_sub(now(), interval weekday(now()) day), '%Y-%m-%d' )) and (select date_format(date_sub(now(), interval weekday(now()) - 6 day), '%Y-%m-%d' ))) a left join product b on a.productId = b.productId
